p: LDH catalyzes the final step in the glycolytic pathway that converts pyruvate into lactate, and a higher lactate level significantly correlates with tumor recurrence and the metastatic potential of tumors resulting in poor patient outcomes [ 37]. Besides this, several studies have identified a prominent role of LDHA in TNBCs [ 38]. Propolis significantly inhibited the levels of LDHA, demonstrating promising effects in the prevention of TNBCs.
